singleItemContent: What kind of house or flat do you want to live in the future?
Are the transportation facilities to your home very good?
Do you prefer to live in a house or a flat?
Can you describe the place where you live?
What kind of housing accommodation do you live in?
What do you like about your flat?
Which room does your family spend most of the time in?
What do you dislike about it?
Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam
And explain how you felt in the traffic jam
How can we solve the traffic jam problem?
Do you think developing public transport can solve traffic jam problems?
Do you think the high ways will help reduce traffic jams?
What are good ways to manage traffic?
